overview: Pornographer Gonzo B. Defended wants VCA Contract Starlet Tawny Roberts to do a gonzo for him so that he can make a lucrative cable deal. When VCA denies him use of their hottest commodity, he is to storm the offices and hold Tawny captive until his demands are met. VCA concedes to his demands, but there's a catch - he has to use Chloe in the scene instead. Everything seems to be settled until Tawny sees how much fun Chloe is having and decides she doesn't want to miss out and has to try it for herself.
title: Gonzo The Feature
